title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Navigating the future: Solutions architecture in the age of AI (ARC203)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 导航未来：AI时代的解决方案架构 (ARC203)
abstract: AI is dramatically accelerating technological evolution, with new architectural primitives emerging monthly. This unprecedented pace transforms the Solutions Architect (SA) role from system designer to change navigator. Learn how SAs deliver value by enabling and de-risking rapid transformation while maintaining architectural stability. Discover strategies for developing new capabilities while preserving foundational expertise. This session explores how to guide organizations through an accelerating technology landscape where managing change has become the primary architectural challenge.
abstract_cn: AI正在显著加速技术演进，每月都有新的架构原语出现。这种前所未有的速度将解决方案架构师（SA）的角色从系统设计师转变为变革导航者。了解SA如何通过启用和降低快速转型风险来交付价值，同时保持架构稳定性。探索在保持基础专业知识的同时开发新能力的策略。本次会议探讨如何引导组织穿越加速的技术环境，在这种环境中，管理变革已成为主要的架构挑战。
